name: WorldCapitals
0:
”Alexa, start world capitals quiz”
”launch world capitals quiz”
”play world capitals quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: world capitals quiz
des:
World Capitals Quiz is both meant for Education as well as Entertainment Purpose.
The quiz will question you about world Capitals. For Example : - 
What is the Capital of United States?.
User, have to answer the question, and then Alexa will grant you a score if it will be a correct answer, or a zero in case of a wrong one.
Also, If you are not familiar with any Capital or Country. You can just name that Capital or Country, and Alexa will answer you the Capital and Country in the below format. For Example :-
"New Delhi" is the Capital of "India".

This Skill is aimed at helping Children and Adults, learn about the World Capitals in a more easier and entertaining way.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
